bike.description: Low standover MX-Moto frame design, MX Hi-Ten tubing, includes chainguard and training wheels

components.description: Tubular unicrown, MX Hi-Ten, 28.6 straight blades
Poweder coated white steel 28H rims, steel front and Hi-Stop coaster brake rear hubs, 14G nickel-plated spokes
Cold-forged steel, electro-plated black finish, 4 1/2" arms, 36T chainring
BMX style, 8D sweep x 125mm rise x 520mm wide with safety bell
BMX alloy with front facing removable cap, 150mm quill
